name: IrelandPoliticalOpinionPoll
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Party popularity information from the latest poll information available. Use this skill to keep track of the various political parties in Ireland. Add it to your flash briefing to keep up to date with the latest information - raising and lowering popularity of the parties competing for seats in Dáil Éireann and Seanad Éireann. Feedback welcomed.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
